dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4399469K] Copyright Violation Notification by nareshinfotech.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 9:17 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4399469K] Copyright Violation Notification by
nareshinfotech.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Violation Notification by nareshinfotech.com
Added by system at Monday, Jun 4 2007 02:11 pm 
X-MailFrom: bill@techcare.com 
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net

Subject: Copyright Violation Notification by nareshinfotech.com

FILETIME=[27F8EF30:01C7A6DC] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
June 4, 2007 
 
Dear Naresh, 
 
It has come to our attention that you are republishing original content 
and graphic images from techcare.com on your Website, located at: 
 
Domain Name: nareshinfotech.com 
IP Address: 70.84.250.228 
Website Status: active 
Server Type: Apache 
Cache Date: 2007-06-03 21:05:12 MST 
 
Your unauthorized use of original material from techcare.com is in 
violation of copyrights owned by Wilfred M. Forshey Jr. If you do not 
immediately remove the copyrighted material from nareshinfotech.com, and

notify us in writing that you have done so, we will have no choice but 
to pursue legal action against you. 
 
A copy of this letter has also been forwarded to the internet provider  
hosting the nareshinfotech.com domain. 
 
OrgName:    ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
OrgID:      TPCM 
Address:    1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Address:    Suite 110 
City:       Dallas 
StateProv:  TX 
PostalCode: 75207 
Country:    US 
ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321 
NetRange:   70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 
admins@theplanet.com 
 
We require the copyrighted material to be removed and written notice  
given that such has been removed, by no later than June 30, 2007. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Wilfred M Forshey Jr. 
TechCare - TronLabs 
5725 Venture Park Rd. 
Kalamazoo, MI 49009 USA
